name: Oi! GIT!
description:
[BASIC INSTRUCTIONS]

[AGENT FURTHER ADVISED TO READ LETTER ATTACHED BELOW INSTRUCTIONS]

Move with WASD, click to interact, right click to throw.

The VT-500 GITCORP Terminal at the end of the rooms contain orders and instructions (show final needed result by using command "c").

  • Any line prepended with "++" should be put through the green "PAINT ++" machine.
  • Any line prepended with "--" should be put through the red "PAINT --" machine.
  • Mistakes can be erased by using the eraser machine.
  • Any line prepended with "!!" should be thrown into the DELETER.
  • Any line prepended with "==" should be left-as is.
  • Click on code blocks with other code blocks to combine them, use  the hammer to split them apart.
  • Once they are in the correct order, you may put the assembled block on the SCANDESK then use command "f" to move on to the next level.

 If there are any catastrophic mistakes, (such as due to [REDACTED]) please use the terminal command "r" to reset. 

Press "h" for terminal command help.

RELOAD THE PAGE EVERYTIME THE GAME OVER SCREEN APPEARS.

[EMPLOYEE TRAINING MATERIAL. PLEASE ENTER A MORE SUGGESTIVE STATE.]


The Global Information Terminal Corporation:

Build the DIFF, Merge the Code

Also known as GIT Co.

Welcome to GIT Corporation, {employee_name}. //ERROR: Employee has no name.

Out of thousands of applications, YOU were chosen to join our wonderful company. 

You will play the most important and splendid role of one of our Agents, one that can not be compared to that of a lowly office worker: You will build the DIFFs that power our MERGEs. 

Combine the code to order, paint, delete, hammer code, then put it all into the scanner to complete the task. 

Its so easy, even YOU can do it!

Good Luck, and Have Fun!

Working Hours: After work is done, you can go home.

[MANAGER OR HIGHER LEVEL EMPLOYEES ONLY] Agents will learn the true meaning of "When the work is done" after their first "workday".

Tools Provided: Paint ++/-- machine, GIT CORP Terminal VT-500, Hammer, Eraser, Deleter, Scanner

[MANAGER OR HIGHER LEVEL EMPLOYEES ONLY] The agents will figure out the real reason why the DELETER is larger than a person when driven to the edge.

Payment: $25.00/hr 

[MANAGER OR HIGHER LEVEL EMPLOYEES ONLY] We are never actually required to pay any amount of wages, thanks to the Let People Work Act of 2034. Additionally, agents will have no use for money after embracing our loving corporate arms. Inflate this number to secure the hire if necessary.

Office: Lively Environment with Music

[MANAGER OR HIGHER LEVEL EMPLOYEES ONLY]The offices have many cases of insanity occurring. The fluorescent lights and fans have not been replaced in 5 decades. High level or valuable employees or persons entering must be equipped with GITCORP-PSYCH visors in order to prevent any psychological influence.

Agents! The Global Information Terminal Corporation Awaits!

 [ADDENDUM - CREDITS TO MAIN TEAM]
